Room.Name: Elena's Archery Emporium
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Elena's Archery shop. She owns a similar shop in Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: The Archery Emporium sells a number of good elven bows that work significantly better than the ones used by humans. Elena claims that she can't even shoot with a human crossbow. She will be happy to teach you some basic archery skills for a price.
